meanings.definition: A Muslim warrior, especially one fighting against non-Muslims.
meanings.sent1: The ghazis bravely defended their land from invaders.
meanings.sent2: The ghazis were known for their courage in battle.
meanings.sent3: The ghazis decided to have a friendly competition to see who could recite the most verses from the Quran.
meanings.sent4: The ghazis' determination was a shining beacon in the darkness of war.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ghazis charging into battle on horseback was etched in the minds of all who witnessed it.
